ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Observer

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, Observable
    Model for an Item, Is owned by an inventory which is owned by a user.
